Meta.title: Danalin of Water
Meta.author: Tomy
Meta.description: [h1]Overview[/h1] This mod introduces a new faith, [b]"Danalin of Water"[/b]. The faith bonuses fluctuate weekly, and the bonuses increase as the insanity rises. [h1]Details[/h1] [h2]Favored Offerings[/h2] [list][*]Corpses [*]Body parts [/list] [h2]Faith Bonuses[/h2] [list][*]Insanity [/list] Other faith bonuses vary depending on the week. Additionally, the higher the insanity, the greater the faith bonuses become, and additional effects are activated. [h2]Additional Effects from Insanity[/h2] [list][*]10: Detect Faith [*]20: Immunity to dim/confusion/fear caused by insanity [*]30: See Invisible [*]40: Water Breathing [*]50: Cosmic Horror 2 [/list] [h2]Faith Rewards[/h2] [spoiler] [olist][*]Drown (Pet) [*]Amulet of the seas (Artifact) [/olist] [h3]Drown[/h3] [list][*]Possesses feats such as Fear from the Stars, See Invisible, and Underwater Breathing [*]Treated as Undead [*]Can use the Eye Of Insanity [/list] [h3]Amulet of the seas[/h3] [list][*]Comes with the Charisma enchantment [*]Provides faction enchantments for Water Breathing, Swimming, and every crafting skill [/list] [/spoiler] [h2]Altars[/h2] By installing this mod, water altars will appear among the altars placed in fields and Nefias. [h1]Notes[/h1] The redistribution of image assets used in this mod is strictly prohibited.
